prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Edgar Lee Masters Page Proofs, Accession #7767-i, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was given to the library by the estate of Gertrude B. Claytor on 1991 May 9 and then transferred from Rare Books.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of manuscripts from Edgar Lee Masters. One is an incomplete page proof More Peoplewritten in 1939, pages 31-192. The other is Vachel Lindsaywritten in 1935.
